section.name: Building Fulcrum
section.p: Building Fulcrum from CVS is now very easy because it has been Maven-enabled. Before you begin, you'll need to check out the jakarta-turbine-fulcrum CVS repository (if you are not familiar with the Jakarta CVS repositories, please refer to the documentation).
Please refer to the Maven Getting Started document for instructions on how to install and use Maven.

From the root directory of the fuklcrum project (where you checked out the code to or unpacked a source distribution), simply type 'maven' and press enter. This will start a process that will build each component. After the component is built, it will be installed into you local maven repository.
To build a local copy of the documentation, use 'mave site-all'. This will build a local copy of the web site in the 'target/docs' directory.
